name: FLEABAG
description:
You are hungry for trash. The rats are hungry for flesh.

Search for trashcans to dig in. Collect trash to increase your score. Avoid the hungry rats. 

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys/WASD - Movement
E - Dig inside and loot trashcans.
Space - Attack
Q - Light Barrels to create eliminated safe zones. 

CREDITS:
